=======
History
=======

0.1.2 (2020-02-05)
------------------

* Added support for split VFF archives
* Added ``lmlsb edit`` command
* Added ``lmlsb batchinsert`` command
* Added support for reading GAL images, and ``galconvert`` CLI tool

0.1.0 (2019-03-07)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
